throwstick

trahere “drag, pull”
teurel truar 投じる とうじる tōjiru طرح tarh طَرْح ṭarḥ “throw” terv tewlel towl- towel 投 tóu ⇔ topple
tirar tırw => лақтыру laqtırw lleqt ject :

tir ⇔ 𓌕 arrow, projectile

𓌕 arrojar = throw ⇔ rotāre Rad
